1. Welcome to the educational section!\n This app allows users to classify images using advanced artificial intelligence models.\n You can upload an image, and the app predicts its category based on training data.\n Image classification involves analyzing an image and assigning a label based on its content.\n For example, identifying whether an image contains a cat, dog, or car.\n\n
2. The app uses a machine learning model trained on the CIFAR-10 dataset,\n which contains 10 classes: airplanes, cars, birds, cats, deers, dogs, frogs, horses, ships, and trucks.\n Please ensure the uploaded image belongs to one of these 10 categories for accurate predictions.\n\n
3. Explore further to discover the wonders of artificial intelligence and image classification!
